bibl.title: Poet, Victor, and Justice in Bacchylides. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Discusses the presentation of the figures of victor and poet in Bacchylides and how they compare with their Pindaric counterparts. - Pp. 32-33: Bibliography.
bibl.seg: KYRIAKOU Poulheria, Poet, Victor, and Justice in Bacchylides. Avec résumé en anglais.
Discusses the presentation of the figures of victor and poet in Bacchylides and how they compare with their Pindaric counterparts. - Pp. 32-33: Bibliography.
